subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Phillies’ ace, Roy Halladay, threw a three-hit shutout to end the Mets’ streak at eight. The Mets’ starter Mike Pelfrey yielded six runs in four innings.
snippet: The Phillies’ ace, Roy Halladay, threw a three-hit shutout to end the Mets’ streak at eight. The Mets’ starter Mike Pelfrey yielded six runs in four innings.
